revised_title: Interaction of Stationary Crossflow Vortices and Tollmien-Schlichting Waves in Boundary Layer on a Rotating Disc
tldr: This study examines the interaction between stationary crossflow vortices and Tollmien-Schlichting waves in the boundary layer of a rotating disc. The research focuses on understanding the effects of these vortices on the stability characteristics of the waves and how they can stabilize or destabilize the waves depending on their orientation. The findings can help improve the understanding of fluid flow instabilities and the development of laminar control wings.
